title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 4, ch. VII, pt. 209 - Privacy Protection and Accuracy of Personal Data
content:

State Regulations
§ 209.1 - Statement of purpose
§ 209.2 - Definitions
§ 209.3 - Times, places for inspecting records and means for verifying the identity of a data subject
§ 209.4 - Requests for records
§ 209.5 - Fees for copying records
§ 209.6 - Inspection and copying records
§ 209.7 - Appeals of denial of access to records
§ 209.8 - Procedures governing the correction or amendment of records

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 4, ch. VII, pt. 209

Statutory authority: Civil Service Law, art. 14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
